properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:35AM EST until February 12 at 8:20AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

South Chickamauga Creek Near Chickamauga TN affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties
Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County

Rain will return to the area for the next few days, and rainfall
amounts of two to three inches may fall in the river basins through
Wednesday morning.

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Pigeon River At Newport TN.
* From Tuesday afternoon until Wednesday morning.
* At 10:00 AM Monday the stage was 5.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Tuesday early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 8.5 feet by Tuesday evening. The river
will fall below flood stage by early Wednesday morning.
* At 8.0 feet...Minor flooding occurs downstream from gage on Highway
25/70 and in the community of Edwina. Jimtown Road may be affected.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
